original_text: And they buried Abner in Hebron: and the king lifted up his voice, and wept at the grave of Abner; and all the people wept.
korean_text: 아브넬을 헤브론에 장사하고 아브넬의 무덤에서 왕이 소리를 높여 울고 백성도 다 우니라

sentences.original_text: And they buried Abner in Hebron:
and the king lifted up his voice,
and wept at the grave of Abner;
